ยง 81.27 Commission to guardian.
 Within five days after the guardian has filed a designation under
section 81.26 of this article, and has filed a bond in accordance with
the provisions of section 81.25 of this article unless the court has
waived the filing of the bond or unless the guardian's appointment is
pursuant to section 81.23 of this article, the clerk of the court shall
issue a commission which shall state:
 1. the title of the proceeding and the name, address, and telephone
number of the incapacitated person; and
 2. the name, address, and telephone number of the guardian and the
specific powers of such guardian; and
 3. the date when the appointment of the guardian was ordered by the
court; and
 4. the date on which the appointment terminates if one has been
ordered by the court.
